title: @RIOT Why is the Battlecast Bundle (Viktors Glorious) not priced according to what I already have?
body:
^^
Would cost me 14089 RP (which is wierd price so I guess it has been changed by what I own somewhat. But the price of the things I don't own from the bundle equals 3685 RP (I love Battlecast stuff).
Why Rito Why?

replies.body: We've just added this back to the store and the discounts are now working. Please let us know if you continue to see issues and thanks for the report.
There are issues, now the bundle is looking way too cheap.

Here is a picture supporting this,
legendary skin and battle kog'maw and icon and ward all for under the sale price of kog'maw skin
Thanks for raising this. we are looking into the issue now.

I would gift PRIMAWESOME a skin of his choice for such rare honesty, to make an example of the correct behaviour to the rest of the community, and after all he did just save RIOT a LOT of money and made sure the efforts of the skin team didn't go to waste :)
i completely agree with that, i have seen so many people that would have gladly kept quiet about that(me included) and i think this person should be given an award for what he has done.{{item:3070}}

Hey guys,

There is an issue with the bundle discount right now. We are working on it now, I will update this thread when it is fixed.

Hi Folks,

We have disabled the bundle for the moment while we fix the discounting.  We'll let you know when its back on!

Cheers
Mindstar
Wow tho, that was fast. Thx Rito XD

I own every champ in the bundle, plus B Prime Cho and Battlecast Xerath. It says the bundle will cost me 14,197 RP. 

My news source places the bundle at 13,724 RP.

It will apparantly cost me 473 RP more than the advertised price.
So true! I own like 6 items from that bundle, yet it's full price for me... (14197 RP)

Hey there Summoner,

In regards to bundle prices. Each bundle has a default price which is equivalent to each Champion and Skin involved in the bundle. The in-game shop should take into account any champions and skins from within the bundle that you already own. I am not logged in at the moment so I am unable to verify any info I can give you in regards to this issue. But it is possible that what you own has already been accounted for and the price of 3685 RP is legitimate. Do not forget that the Battlecast skins are fairly pricy in comparison to the skin list. 

But if you have any issues that I wasn't able to help you with, which I believe I haven't please lodge a ticket with SUPPORT.

Regards,
lols =)
